name: Hotatsu

skills.name: Red River
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 40% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: DEF-scaling attack. 3.2 DEF base (4.16 DEF booked with +30% damage).
40% chance Leech debuff for 2 turns base (60% booked with +20% debuff chance). Excellent for sustain once booked.

skills.book_value: Medium: +30% damage + 20% Leech chance (40%→60%). Decent for Leech uptime but not 100%.
skills.notes: DEF-scaling A1 with Leech (60% booked). Not guaranteed Leech but good sustain when landed. 200+ ACC needed. At 3000 DEF: ~13K damage booked.

skills.name: Rushing Death
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: AoE DEF-scaling attack. 4.0 DEF base (4.2 DEF booked with +5% damage).
50% chance Dec ATK (50%) for 2 turns base (80% booked with +30% debuff chance). Good for damage mitigation but not guaranteed.

skills.book_value: HIGH: +30% Dec ATK chance (50%→80%) + -1 cooldown (4→3). MUST BOOK for Dec ATK uptime.
skills.notes: AoE Dec ATK (80% booked) + DEF damage. MUST BOOK for 3-turn cooldown + 80% Dec ATK chance. EXCELLENT for Clan Boss (7/10) and dungeons (7/10) with damage mitigation. 200+ ACC needed. At 3000 DEF: ~12.6K AoE damage booked.

skills.name: Oni Icon
skills.description: Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns and a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on all allies for 1 turn.

effects.notes: 60% Inc DEF buff for all allies for 2 turns. Team-wide survivability boost.
15% Continuous Heal buff for all allies for 1 turn. Team sustain (15% MAX HP heal/turn for 1 turn). Short duration but helpful.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: -1 cooldown (4→3). MUST BOOK for Inc DEF + Continuous Heal uptime.
skills.notes: BUFF SUPPORT: Inc DEF (60%, 2 turns) + Continuous Heal (15%, 1 turn) for team. MUST BOOK for 3-turn cooldown. EXCELLENT for Clan Boss (7/10) and Faction Wars (8/10) with team survivability. Synergizes with passive (debuff removal).

skills.name: Spirit Touched
skills.description: Removes 1 random debuff from this Champion at the start of each turn. Will remove [Stun], [Sleep], [Freeze], [Fear], [True Fear] and [Provoke] debuffs before other debuffs.

effects.notes: PASSIVE CLEANSE: Removes 1 random debuff from Hotatsu at start of turn. PRIORITY: Stun, Sleep, Freeze, Fear, True Fear, Provoke first (CC priority). Then other debuffs. 3-turn cooldown. EXCELLENT for CC resistance and self-sustain. Synergizes with A3 (Inc DEF + Continuous Heal) for survivability.

skills.book_value: N/A: Passive, cannot book. 3-turn cooldown built-in.
skills.notes: PASSIVE CLEANSE: Removes 1 debuff/turn (3-turn cooldown). Prioritizes CC debuffs (Stun/Sleep/Freeze/Fear/Provoke) before others. EXCELLENT for Clan Boss (Stun removal), dungeons (CC waves), and Faction Wars (survivability). Synergizes with A3 Inc DEF + Continuous Heal for self-sustain.

forms.aura: Increases Ally DEF in Faction Crypts by 33%
forms.comments: DEF-based support specialist with Leech, Dec ATK, Inc DEF, and Continuous Heal. A3 'Oni Icon' Inc DEF (60%) + Continuous Heal (15%) for team. Passive 'Spirit Touched' removes 1 debuff/turn (CC priority). A2 'Rushing Death' AoE Dec ATK (80% booked). EXCELLENT for Faction Wars (8/10) with +33% DEF aura. Good for Clan Boss (7/10), dungeons (7/10), and Doom Tower (7/10). Must book A2/A3.
